entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Fog patches overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 11 January 2023
